#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int n=0,m=0,a[1000001],b[1000001],freq[1000001]={0};
int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    #endif // ONLINE_JUDGE
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
    cin>>n>>m;
    int i=0;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>a[i];
        freq[a[i]]=1;
    }
    for(i=0;i<m;i++)
        cin>>b[i];
    int counter=0;
    for(i=0;i<m;i++)
    {
        if(freq[b[i]]==1)
            {
                counter+=1;
                freq[b[i]]=0;
            }
    }
    cout<<counter<<endl;
    return 0;
}
